events.message: The insured submitted a claim reporting a collision involving their vehicle on highway 75, causing visible body damage.
After initial review, claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords found in the incident description.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to ensure smooth handling of the vehicle collision case.
The claimant received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under process.
The claims department requested additional documents including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
Claimant submitted all requested documentation, including the police report and photographs of the accident scene.
A detailed investigation into the circumstances of the automobile accident began immediately following document submission.
The investigation completed successfully, confirming liability and the extent of the damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage for the accident claim.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the claims handling process.
Following acceptance of the settlement, the insurance claim for the auto accident was officially approved.
The payment covering the approved amount for vehicle repairs was issued to the claimant without delay.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair commencement.
All case files and documents related to the vehicle collision claim have been securely archived for future reference.
